name: Zephyranthes Lily, Rain Lily (Random color) - Bulbs (set of 10)
description: Zephyranthes can be deciduous or evergreen bulbous perennials, with linear leaves and funnel-shaped or crocus-like flowers in spring, summer or autumn.Leaves are a deep glossy green and measure 3 mm wide. Flowers, which at first resemble a new leaf, but emerge from their papery sheaves to a stunning whiteness; they are erect in perianth.

name: Coco peat block - 600 g (Expands Up to 5 - 8 L)
description: Coco peat is a soil substitute or addition to it. Known for its good water holding capacity. Expands to 5-8 L.Coco peat is the soilless potting mix. Easy to carry block form.It is lightweight, best for balconies & terrace gardening, easy to carry, saves Water, eco-friendly Organic. Best potting media for seeds germination.
